ModMetaData.name: Local Growing First (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: FuriouslyEloquent
ModMetaData.description:
Update of FuriouslyEloquents mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1433579722
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/LocalGrowingFirst
--- Original Description --- Ensures pawns will harvest/sow within their current growing zone before heading to others!
Fully save game compatible
